name: [ ledere ]
description:
~ to damage/to pain ~
.
.
"have you place yourself between my unseen pains?
deep down within my unseen misery?

with all the remaining sincerity I have,
and all the immaculate fairness I have gathered,
I'll make it bloom, even though you've hurt my very soul,
I'll make it glorious, even though you've killed my very pride.

unbound by the time,
unbound by the space,
and longing for everlasting journey..."
--210222
.
.
Graphite pencils on paper.
2400 x 2400 pixel.
.
.
.
Note:
I made this at one of my hardest moment in life, where there was betrayals, backstabs and lies.
I was in my lowest, trying to occupy myself with something fun was just too much of a job.
'time will heal' they say, and it's true, time will eventually heal you, including myself.
And I used that pain of mine as a fuel to create stuff, to move forward, and to strive.
So, even though I was in pain, parts of me scattered all over the places, I adapt, and I strive.
.
.
.
